info.name: Redshift Forums Dark
info.description: A dark theme for the Redshift render engine forums. The new layout is quite bright so this should be a bit easier on the eyes, particularly at night. There may be slight differences across browsers but overall theming should be consistent.
info.additionalInfo: [1.2] 2019-03-21 - Code blocks now use Courier and monospace - Code blocks font size reduced to .8em - Code block margins increased to .8rem - Code blocks container style modified [1.1] 2017-07-20 - Advanced Search - Login Page - Pagination - Code blocks - Site Navigation Known Bugs: Standard site pages have text issues (need coloring) ---------- [1.0] 2017-07-19 - Forum Home Page - All threads - Fast Reply, New Topic, and Post Reply - Visitor Stats - Forum Breadcrumbs bar
